PIPPA GRANT

INTRODUCTION

The Last Eligible Billionaire A fake relationship / grumpy - sunshine / billionaire romance

Emotionally unavailable does n’t even begin to describe [[my]0-i new fake boyfriend]312-my new fake boyfriend . [He]312-my new fake boyfriend ’s cold . [He]312-my new fake boyfriend ’s distant . [He]312-my new fake boyfriend has more defenses than a nuclear missile silo . And [he]312-my new fake boyfriend ’s the ultimate catch of the century . At least , according to [his]312-my new fake boyfriend bank statement . [My]0-i job ’s simple : Keep [[Hayes Rutherford]104-hayes ’s matchmaking [relatives]314-relatives]313-hayes rutherford ’s matchmaking relatives and [all interested ladies]315-all interested ladies away from [the cranky , grumpy , walled - off heir to [my]0-i favorite movie empire]316-the cranky , grumpy , walled - off heir to my favorite movie empire , and in return , [he]312-my new fake boyfriend wo n’t ruin [my]0-i life over a teensy , tiny little misunderstanding . But the more [I]0-i sneak past [Hayes]104-hayes ’s walls and fences , the more [I]0-i realize that while [we]317-we might be from [different worlds]318-different worlds , [we]317-we have more in common than either of [us]317-we expected . [The man under all the glitz , glamour , and dollar signs]319-the man under all the glitz , glamour , and dollar signs could be the real love of [my]0-i life . But [you]320-you know what [they]321-they say about fake dating [a billionaire]322-a billionaire — it ’s all fun and games until the scandals start . [The Last Eligible Billionaire]323-the last eligible billionaire is a swoony , laugh - out - loud romance featuring a botched wax job , [a woman in over [her]324-a woman in over her head head]324-a woman in over her head , [a man in over [his]325-a man in over his heart heart]325-a man in over his heart , and [the sweetest misguided dog to ever play matchmaker]326-the sweetest misguided dog to ever play matchmaker … or at least make sure [these two anti - love birds]327-these two anti - love birds never have clothes when [they]327-these two anti - love birds get out of the shower .

1

Hayes Alexander Rutherford]104-hayes , aka [a billionaire who would give [his]330-a billionaire who would give his fortune to never see another single woman again in his life fortune to never see [another single woman]331-another single woman again in [his]330-a billionaire who would give his fortune to never see another single woman again in his life life]330-a billionaire who would give his fortune to never see another single woman again in his life

There ’s exactly one thing [a man]332-a man wants after two weddings , a funeral , a clandestine overnight drive , and an unfortunate incident with roadkill , and it is not more drama . It is never more drama . Or [more people]333-more people . Or a complete and total disaster in [what ’s supposed to be]334-what ’s supposed to be [a haven]335-a haven . Yet instead of falling into bed at [[my]0-i private retreat]336-my private retreat on [a small island off [the coast of [Maine]2-maine]338-the coast of maine]337-a small island off the coast of maine , with the French doors of [[my]0-i bedroom balcony]339-my bedroom balcony open to let in the sound of the ocean waves rolling to [shore]340-shore while [I]0-i escape into a mindless oblivion to recover from the past few weeks , [I]0-i ’ve arrived to a problem . [Someone]341-someone has broken into [[my]0-i estate]342-my estate just as surely as the sun is breaking over the clouds off the horizon as it rises over the water . The back door to [the main house]343-the main house is unlocked , the lights are on , dirty dishes and clothing are scattered all over [the covered porch]344-the covered porch , [someone]341-someone ’s piled paint - stained rags outside [the laundry room]346-the laundry room , and the refrigerator is gaping open . Worse ? There ’s cheesecake in [[my]0-i refrigerator]347-my refrigerator . Cheesecake , pink wine — no , [I]0-i do n’t care what kind it is , not if it ’s pink — three bags of peanut butter cups , two Styrofoam containers of god only knows what , a massive raw steak , a bottle of Tabasco sauce , and a stick of butter . All inside the refrigerator that should have [its]347-my refrigerator doors closed but does n’t . [I]0-i stick [my]0-i hand into the fridge . Room temperature . The wine bottle is n’t even sweating anymore , which means the doors have been open so long the damn refrigerator has ceased to function at all . Worse ? This means whoever broke into [[my]0-i house]348-my house ruined cheesecake . How is it that the cheesecake is the most egregious of [[my]0-i intruder]349-my intruder ’s sins ? [My]0-i head aches . [My]0-i body is stiff and sore . [I]0-i might have a touch of whiplash , [I]0-i definitely smell faintly of skunk , [I]0-i ’m exhausted , and [someone]341-someone — [an unauthorized someone who should not be in [[my]0-i sanctuary]352-my sanctuary after all the lengths [I]0-i went to in order to reach [this place]353-this place anonymously and undetected]351-an unauthorized someone who should not be in my sanctuary after all the lengths i went to in order to reach this place anonymously and undetected — is letting cheesecake go bad in [my]0-i open refrigerator . This should not be the most appalling error of the morning , yet here [we]354-we are . [I]0-i ’m rapidly becoming irrationally angry over spoiled cheesecake . One hand on [my]0-i phone , the other wrapped firmly around [my]0-i regrets in ditching [my]0-i security detail , [I]0-i make [my]0-i way through [the living room]355-the living room to the staircase . There ’s a subtle hint of music drifting from somewhere above , mud prints on [my]0-i wood floor — both human and animal — and a maroon jacket embroidered with a smiling hot dog hanging on the banister . This keeps getting worse . For god ’s sake , [Hayes]104-hayes , call [the police]356-the police , [[my]0-i mother]357-my mother would say . [You]104-hayes ’re already not the catch [[your]104-hayes brother]358-your brother was . Do n’t ruin what little good looks [you]104-hayes have left by confronting [the ruffians]359-the ruffians . Reason enough to do this [myself]0-i . If [I]0-i were a tad uglier , perhaps [the fortune - hunting bachelorettes that [I]0-i ca n’t seem to avoid]360-the fortune - hunting bachelorettes that i ca n’t seem to avoid would be less inclined to bat [their]360-the fortune - hunting bachelorettes that i ca n’t seem to avoid lashes [my]0-i way . Not that [their]360-the fortune - hunting bachelorettes that i ca n’t seem to avoid attention has anything to do with [my]0-i looks . Who needs looks when [your]104-hayes bank account has as many zeroes as [mine]0-i , and when [[your]104-hayes mother]361-your mother is as encouraging as [mine]0-i ? Provided [you]104-hayes have the right pedigree and pass [her]357-my mother background check , that is . The scent of something sweet and unexpected tickles [my]0-i nose , and not the way cheesecake would . This is a nose - tickle of perfume . Given the increasing volume of the echoing music — is that “ [I]357-my mother Will Survive”?—and[357-my mother] the yowling to go along with it , [I]0-i do n’t believe [I]0-i ’m about to find [[my]0-i property manager]362-my property manager here taking advantage of [my]0-i absence to live it up . While [I]0-i ’m hardly an expert on [the man]363-the man , [I]0-i ’m positive [he]363-the man ’s not [the girl power song type]364-the girl power song type . Which means [I]0-i ’m about to find [[my]0-i squatter]365-my squatter in [the bathroom]366-the bathroom . [I]0-i make [my]0-i way down [the hallway]367-the hallway to [[my]0-i suite]368-my suite and gently press the latch . The door swings easily and soundlessly as [I]0-i push it open , revealing another disaster of clothing strewn about [[my]0-i bedroom]369-my bedroom and increasing the volume of the singing drastically . Two bras dangle off the mirror over [my]0-i armoire . A box of tampons sits open on the floor outside the bathroom door . Four pairs of muddy shoes are scattered about the floor , perilously close to the Turkish rug beneath [my]0-i bed . But the mess is nothing compared to the singing . Dear god , the singing . There ’s not a human in [[my]0-i bathroom]370-my bathroom . There ’s a hyena stuck in the awkward stage of puberty , sucking down a helium balloon , and then letting it all go in an off - key rendition of the world ’s worst karaoke song . Not helping the headache . Not helping the bone - deep exhaustion from the travel to get [here]371-here stealthily . Not helping [my]0-i desire to be completely alone , away from [the world]372-the world , away from [scheming socialites]373-scheming socialites and [[my]0-i mother]357-my mother and wedding cakes and funeral flowers and the weight of generations ’ worth of expectations that have landed squarely on [my]0-i shoulders now that [I]0-i ’m not only [the new chief financial officer of [[my]0-i family ’s company]376-my family ’s company]375-the new chief financial officer of my family ’s company , but also , rather quickly and unexpectedly , [the final unmarried male billionaire under the age of eighty - three on [this entire planet]378-this entire planet]377-the final unmarried male billionaire under the age of eighty - three on this entire planet . [You]379-you ’d think being nearly forty would give [me]0-i all the freedom [I]0-i need to tell anyone meddling in [my]0-i personal life to fuck off , but [[my]0-i family]380-my family ’s fortune started with [children]381-children ’s cartoons in the 1950s and has continued with family - friendly movies , television shows , streaming networks , [amusement parks]382-amusement parks , and branded merchandise , with most of [us]383-us still front and center as [the modern family of dreams]384-the modern family of dreams . [We]383-us ’re the very pillar of perfection . [The Rutherfords]106-rutherfords do not engage in scandalous behavior publicly , even mild infractions involving a slip of the tongue , no matter how much [I]0-i ’d like to climb [the Brooklyn Bridge]385-the brooklyn bridge and let out a massive fuck some days . And if [I]0-i think [[my]0-i relatives]386-my relatives ’ attempts to introduce [me]0-i to [dozens of women who will be [the next woman of [my]0-i dreams]388-the next woman of my dreams]387-dozens of women who will be the next woman of my dreams is irritating , it ’s nothing compared to the brow - beating [I]0-i ’d get for not living up to the family name . The song changes , and [[my]0-i squatter]365-my squatter launches into an off - key accompaniment to “ thank [u]2945-u , next . ”[365-my squatter] It is too damn early for [Ariana Grande]107-ariana grande and [her]107-ariana grande lovely voice on - key . Forget a pubescent over - heliumed hyena off - key . [I]0-i take two steps farther into [[my]0-i bedroom]369-my bedroom and spot [[my]0-i intruder]349-my intruder through the crack in the bathroom door . Three more steps , and [I]0-i can clearly see [her]349-my intruder . In a manner of speaking . [Her]349-my intruder hair is wrapped in a deep blue towel , [my]0-i black silk robe dangles from [her]349-my intruder shoulders , [her]349-my intruder face is coated in green something , and [she]349-my intruder has one leg propped on the edge of [my]0-i elegant tub , where [she]349-my intruder ’s — Dear god , tell [me]0-i [she]349-my intruder is not doing what [I]0-i think [she]349-my intruder ’s doing . [She]349-my intruder wails along with the lyrics that [I]0-i frankly ca n’t understand , and also which do n’t seem to be lyrics that should be wailed , while [she]349-my intruder gives a hard yank that momentarily interrupts the singing as [she]349-my intruder yelps in pain . [She]349-my intruder is . [She]349-my intruder ’s waxing [her]349-my intruder bikini line with one foot perched at the edge of [my]0-i marble soaking tub . While wearing [my]0-i robe . The very audacity of [this woman]392-this woman . Invading [[my]0-i home]393-my home . Leaving litter and dirty dishes and soiled clothing on every available surface . Disregarding all respect for cheesecake . And standing in [[my]0-i bathroom]370-my bathroom , grooming [herself]349-my intruder while ruining already questionable songs . This ends . Now . [I]0-i step through the open doorway , ready to toss [her]349-my intruder over [my]0-i shoulder and then off [the balcony]395-the balcony . “ What in the devil do [you]0-i think [you]0-i ’re doing ? ”[349-my intruder] [She]349-my intruder spins , screams , and then , with ninja - fast reflexes , grabs an industrial - size bottle of shampoo , also from the edge of [my]0-i tub , and hurtles it at [my]0-i head . “ Stop ! ”[0-i] [I]0-i order . “ Intruder ! ”[349-my intruder] [she]349-my intruder yells over the infernal music . “ Marshmallow ! Attack ! ”[349-my intruder] [She]349-my intruder grabs a towel and flings it at [me]0-i too . [I]0-i dodge it easily , though [my]0-i weary body would prefer this was unnecessary . “ Stop . ”[349-my intruder] For the love of every Razzle Dazzle film ever made , why did [I]0-i finally choose today to ditch [[my]0-i security team]396-my security team ? What the fuck is marshmallow ? Is [she]349-my intruder kinky ? Is it [her]349-my intruder safe word ? Does [she]349-my intruder think [I]0-i ’m [a stripper]398-a stripper ? There [I]0-i go with the fucks . Apologies , [Mother]109-mother . “ What are [you]104-hayes doing here ? ”[109-mother] “ Marshmallow ! ”[349-my intruder] [she]349-my intruder bellows . [She]349-my intruder ’s spinning in a circle , muttering about too many damn doors , the towel on [her]349-my intruder head tilting , robe flapping open and giving [me]0-i more of a view than [I]0-i want of [any woman]402-any woman today , and [I]0-i finally catch on . [Fear]110-fear . [She]349-my intruder ’s afraid . Slow on the uptake , [Hayes]104-hayes ? [I]0-i grunt to [myself]0-i , fist [my]0-i hands in [my]0-i pockets , and lean in the closet doorway , forcing [myself]0-i to calm down and look at [her]349-my intruder like a math problem instead of as a fleshy ball of emotions who ’s latched on to a hair dryer and is aiming it at [me]0-i like [she]349-my intruder can blow [me]0-i out of the doorway . “ Who are [you]349-my intruder ? ”[349-my intruder] For the record , it ’s damn hard to keep [my]0-i voice steady . [I]0-i used up every last drop of [my]0-i peopling skills five minutes into [[my]0-i brother]403-my brother ’s wedding reception last night and had to fake it for another six hours . 17

[Hayes]104-hayes

19

[Hayes]104-hayes

[I]0-i ’m hip - deep in first - quarter financial data , ignoring [my]0-i ringing phones — yes , phones — and pulling [my]0-i hair out over the post - it notes decorating the surface of [my]0-i desk to remind [me]0-i about who wants to meet with [me]0-i when and about what for the next infinity . The lunch [Begonia]187-begonia insisted [Nikolay]197-nikolay bring [me]0-i tasted like sawdust , though [I]0-i blame work rather than the food . [I]0-i ’d rather be working on the data with the discrepancy in the real estate books , and [I]0-i ’m about to surrender to the urge when [someone]341-someone knocks on [my]0-i door . [I]0-i ’m agitated that [I]0-i ’m supposed to send this data to someone three levels below [me]0-i for error resolution . [I]0-i ’m agitated that [[my]0-i father]540-my father ’s agitated with [me]0-i for rescheduling a meeting with [him]540-my father . [Hayes

35

BONUS EPILOGUE

[Hayes]104-hayes
